channel.title: Lectures & Homework on MTH 141
channel.description: Recent content in Lectures & Homework on MTH 141

item.title: Weeks 1-4
item.description: Tuesday, August 27 Recitation: Join me today at 2-2:50pm ET for our first live online recitation as we discuss the course, look over the syllabus, and answer any questions that you may have. Use the link on the recitation page of the Course Handbook to join the meeting. Reading Lecture Video Duration Notes Online HW (graded) Textbook HW (ungraded) 2.1 The Tangent and Velocity Problems 32 Notes Section 2.

item.title: Weeks 5-8
item.description: Tuesday, September 24 We have recitation scheduled for today at 2-2:50pm ET Reading Lecture Video Duration Notes Online HW (graded) Textbook HW (ungraded) 3.2 The Product and Quotient Rules 31 Notes Section 3.2 3.2: 1-33(odd), 41, 43, 45, 47, 49 3.1b Exponential Functions 14 Notes Section 3.1b 3.1: 25, 29, 31, 37 3.1b The Natural Exponential Function 22 Notes Comment: Do not worry if you don't know what "

item.title: Weeks 9-12
item.description: Tuesday, October 22 Recitation We have recitation scheduled for today at 2-2:50pm ET Lectures Below are the two lectures assigned for this week. Reading Lecture Video Duration Notes Online HW (graded) Textbook HW (ungraded) 4.1 Maximum and Minimum Values 45 Notes Section 4.1 4.1: 1-61(odd) 4.2 The Mean Value Theorem 53 Notes Section 4.2 4.2: 1-27(odd) Additional Resources and Review Material (optional) Section 4.

item.title: Weeks 13-16
item.description: Tuesday, November 19 Recitation We have recitation scheduled for today at 2-2:50pm ET Lectures Below are the three lectures assigned for this week, all due on December 3rd. Reading Lecture Video Duration Notes Online HW (graded) Textbook HW (ungraded) 5.1 The Area and Distance Problems 55 Notes Section 5.1 5.1: 1-7(odd), 13, 15, 17, 21-25(odd) 5.2a The Precise Definition of the Definite Integral 47 Notes Section 5.
